request.description: Authenticates the user and returns the user's API token.
Signs out the user and destroy's the API token.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by status code: A, C, H, X.
Filter by title. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Creates a new ticket record. Users can only create tickets for themselves. Managers can create tickets for any user.

response.body: {"data":{"type":"ticket","id":1,"attributes":{"title":"ratione possimus dolorem","description":"Eum eaque dignissimos repellendus sit autem. Vitae sit facilis possimus quaerat non est. Consequatur totam rerum blanditiis explicabo.","status":"A","createdAt":"2024-06-01T19:44:11.000000Z","updatedAt":"2024-06-01T19:44:11.000000Z"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":{"type":"user","id":8},"links":{"self":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/authors\/8"}}},"links":{"self":"http:\/\/localhost\/api\/v1\/tickets\/1"}}}

request.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.
Replace the specified ticket in storage.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"omnis","description":"Ex est velit fugit illo quos ab ut.","status":"A"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":[]}}}}

request.description: Update the specified ticket in storage.

query.description: Data field(s) to sort by. Separate multiple fields with commas. Denote descending sort with a minus sign.
Filter by name. Wildcards are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcards are supported.

request.description: Retrieves all tickets created by a specific user.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"suscipit","description":"Sunt alias commodi perferendis molestias sit eligendi.","status":"X"}},"author":"1"}

request.description: Creates a ticket for the specific user.

body.raw: {"data":{"attributes":{"title":"magnam","description":"Pariatur deleniti sint eaque veritatis inventore labore blanditiis.","status":"H"},"relationships":{"author":{"data":[]}}}}

Filter by status name. Wildcards are supported.
Filter by email. Wildcards are supported.
